rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed to welcome guests, with a small foyer leading into the main living areas. It adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the entry with the east for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows, maximizing natural light. Minimalist decor and uncluttered space promote a serene environment.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, featuring large windows for ambient light. The dining area is designed with clean lines and open space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern minimalist kitchen integrated into the living-dining space. It follows Vastu guidelines by having an east-facing entrance for a fresh start in meal preparation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact yet comfortable guest bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure ample natural light, designed per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: The main entrance is located on the south side, in accordance with Vastu principles for stability and prosperity.
Multiple large floor-to-ceiling windows distributed across the living room, dining area, and guest bedroom for optimal natural lighting.
